title: Coronavirus tips: How to make homemade hand sanitizer, face masks
content: Protect yourself from coronavirus with DIY hand sanitizer, face masksMason Callejas. First of all, it should be stressed that washing your hands and practicing social distancing are some of the best ways the CDC recommends to limit the spread of the COVID-19 coronavirus, but additional lines of defense are also nice to have. Hand sanitizer and face masks are two simple ways to help prevent the spread of the virus, but the items have become two of the hottest commodities since the outbreak began.
warning: Based on the content, title, language and advertisements on this page, there is a risk that this page is not credible!
